title: Spotted: Team BikeExchange riding new Giro aero road helmet at the Tour de France?
content:
Hang around pro cyclists long enough, and you’re bound to spot new gear before it’s launched. There has been speculation for months that Giro’s sponsored teams have been testing a new aero road helmet, but the company’s recent facebook posts are putting the helmet in question right out in the open. Shown on the heads […]

The post Spotted: Team BikeExchange riding new Giro aero road helmet at the Tour de France? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
